ygData.subject: Smithing Shields
ygData.msgSnippet: Are shield molds new, or did I just miss them before? I decided to go check out the plate rumors on the Test server and scoped out the various smithing books -
ygData.messageBody:
Are shield molds new, or did I just miss them before? I decided to go check
out the plate rumors on the Test server and scoped out the various smithing
books - no changes. However, one of the vendors in E Freeport, Kif I
believe, no longer had chain armor, but instead a bunch of shield molds -
over a dozen (to account for the various sizes, I believe). I checked after
the patch yesterday on The Nameless, but there was no change there.

--
Ellsa Quintess
Priestess of Bristlebane
Night Custodian, Chapel of Mischief
Rivervale Olympic Diving Champion
